mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1783) for an order placed by Carolton Haney for 150 two color jumbos and one halftone cut of Johnny Cash for a performance of the Kitty Wells Show at a Barn Dance on September 4. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
